product.description: With a SL4 FACT 8r frame and light, efficient 2X10 drivetrain, the Sirrus Pro is up for any challenge and will do it as fast you want, with the added benefit of flat bar convenience for getting around in urban environments.

bullets.bullet: Specialized FACT 8r carbon frame with Zertz provides a lightweight, compliant ride for maximum speed and comfort
Specialized FACT full monocoque fork provides a lightweight, compliant and great handling front end
FSA SL-K carbon compact crankset with 50/34 configuration for lightweight, wide-range gearing

Adjustable, 4-position, oversized forged alloy stem with 31.8mm bar clamp for strength and versatile positioning; plus Body Geometry Targa gel grips lock on and help alleviate hand pain and tingling fingers
Sporty yet comfortable Body Geometry Targa Comp fitness saddle with light, durable hollow Cr-Mo rails
Specialized FACT CG-R seatpost allows for lightweight performance with additional compliance benefits

specs.frame: FRAME Specialized SL4 FACT 8r carbon w/ Zertz inserts, 1-1/8" - 1-3/8" head tube, OSBB
specs.fork: FORK Specialized FACT carbon full monocoque w/ Zertz inserts
specs.headset: HEADSET 1-1/8" FSA Campy style, integrated cartridge, 15mm alloy cone spacer
specs.stem: STEM Specialized Elite-Set, 3D forged alloy, 4-position adjustable, 4-bolt, 31.8mm clamp
specs.handlebars: HANDLEBARS Specialized flat bar, double-butted alloy, 6-degree backsweep, 31.8mm
specs.tape: TAPE Specialized Body Geometry Targa, lock-on w/ integrated bar end
specs.front_brake: FRONT BRAKE Formula C1, hydraulic disc, dual piston, 160mm rotor
specs.rear_brake: REAR BRAKE Formula C1, hydraulic disc, dual piston, 160mm rotor
specs.brake_levers: BRAKE LEVERS Formula C1, hydraulic lever
specs.crankset: CRANKSET FSA SL-K, carbon arms, OSBB, alloy rings
specs.pedals: PEDALS Sirrus, 1.5mm Varus angle, nylon body, symmetric alloy cage, low profile bearing system, toe clip capable
specs.front_tire: FRONT TYRE Specialized Espoir Elite, 60TPI, aramid bead, double BlackBelt protection, 700x25c
specs.rear_tire: REAR TYRE Specialized Espoir Elite, 60TPI, aramid bead, double BlackBelt protection, 700x25c
specs.saddle: SADDLE Body Geometry Targa Comp, Cr-Mo rails, 143mm
specs.seatpost: SEATPOST Specialized CG-R, FACT carbon, single bolt, 27.2mm

product.description: With a SL4 FACT 8r frame and light, efficient 2X10 drivetrain, the Sirrus Expert Disc is up for any challenge and will do it as fast you want, with the added benefit of flat bar convenience for getting around in urban environments, and powerful disc brakes for maximum stopping power.

bullets.bullet: Specialized FACT 8r carbon frame with Zertz provides a lightweight, compliant ride for maximum speed and comfort
Specialized FACT full monocoque fork provides a lightweight, compliant and great handling front end
Reliable Espoir Sport, 25c road tyre with double BlackBelt puncture protection for stability and durability during high-mileage riding
FSA Gossamer compact alloy crankset with 50/34 configuration for lightweight, wide-range gearing
Body Geometry Targa gel grips lock on and help alleviate hand pain and tingling fingers; integrated bar ends for changing hand position included
Strong, reliable, Formula dual-piston hydraulic disc brakes for sure stopping and control in any weather with any load
Sporty yet comfortable Body Geometry Targa Comp fitness saddle with light, durable hollow Cr-Mo rails

product.description: The Sirrus Comp Disc provides road bike geometry with flat bar handling so you can ride fast on longer rides, but also be stable and quick in town. The hydraulic disc brakes mean you'll have confidence to ride regardless of the weather or what you're carrying on your racks.

bullets.bullet: Super light fully-manipulated E5 Premium Aluminium frame is built for high speed, low-fuss, and great versatility; with tapered headtube, internal routing, rack/fender mounts, and wide tyre clearance
Premium Aluminium disc fork with Cr-Mo steerer; with fender mounts and ample tyre clearance for added versatility
Double BlackBelt protection and a wider 28c profile make the Specialized Espoir Sport tyres perfect for city or open road use
FSA Omega compact alloy crankset with 50/34 configuration for lightweight, wide-range gearing

Adjustable, 4-position, oversized forged alloy stem with 31.8mm bar clamp for strength and versatile positioning; plus Body Geometry Targa gel grips lock on and help alleviate hand pain and tingling fingers
Strong, reliable, Tektro Draco hydraulic disc brakes for sure stopping and control in any weather with any load
Sporty yet comfortable Body Geometry Targa Comp fitness saddle with light, durable hollow Cr-Mo rails

product.description: The Sirrus Elite Disc provides road bike geometry with flat bar handling so you can ride fast on longer rides, but also be stable and quick in town. The hydraulic disc brakes mean you'll have confidence to ride regardless of the weather or what you're carrying on your racks.

bullets.bullet: Super light fully-manipulated E5 Premium Aluminium frame is built for high speed, low-fuss, and great versatility; with tapered headtube, internal routing, rack/fender mounts, and wide tyre clearance
Premium Aluminium disc fork with Cr-Mo steerer; with fender mounts and ample tyre clearance for added versatility
Strong and light AXIS Classic Disc wheels
Flak Jacket protection and a grooved tread make the Specialized Nimbus tyres perfect for city or open road use
FSA 9-speed compact crankset with 50/34 configuration provides ample gearing and crisp shifting
Body Geometry Targa gel grips lock on and help alleviate hand pain and tingling fingers
Strong, reliable, Tektro Draco hydraulic disc brakes for sure stopping and control in any weather with any load

product.description: The Sirrus Sport provides road bike geometry with flat bar handling so you can ride fast on longer rides, but also be stable and quick in town. The 27-speed drivetrain with wide gearing allows top speed with hill climbing capabilities, too.

bullets.bullet: A1 Premium Aluminium fully-manipulated frame offers a great ride and versatility; with rack/fender mounts and wide tyre clearance
Sirrus double-wall, machined alloy rims for strength and reliable braking
Flak Jacket protection and a grooved tread make the Specialized Nimbus tyres perfect for city or open road use
Triple crankset for 9-speed drivetrain provides gearing for any terrain; chainguard keeps pants clean
Specialized Body Geometry Targa Sport saddle has front/rear bumpers for durability and ample padding for comfort

product.description: The Sirrus provides road bike geometry with flat bar handling so you can ride fast on longer rides, but also be stable and quick in town. The 24-speed drivetrain with wide gearing allows top speed with hill climbing capabilities, too.

bullets.bullet: A1 Premium Aluminium fully-manipulated frame offers a great ride and versatility; with rack/fender mounts and wide tyre clearance
Straight blade steel fork with fender mounts gives you all the durability you need to manage potholes and rough roads
Sirrus double-wall, machined alloy rims for strength and reliable braking; plus alloy, sealed cassette hub with stainless spokes
Flak Jacket protection and a grooved tread make the Specialized Nimbus tyres perfect for city or open road use
Body Geometry Targa gel grips alleviate hand pain and tingling fingers for all-day riding comfort
Specialized Body Geometry Targa Sport saddle has front/rear bumpers for durability and ample padding for comfort
